title: (x) www.typografie.de - Univers Cd, Sabon {Eduardo}
content:
You guys get me so curious about what typefaces are   
used every where I go... ;)   
   
What faces were used for the splash page of   
 [http://www.typografie.de/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000117/http:/www.typografie.de/)   
   
Happy Labor Day to all!   
   
Thanks!
author: dzgnchic

comments.content:
The sans is Univers Condensed.   
The serif, looks like [Sabon](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000117/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/sabon/italic/testdrive.html?s=Schmidt%2BMainz&p=48) to me. But I'm not sure.
